document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the type-species of the genera of the Cerambycidae, Disteniidae, Oxypeltidae and Vesperidae (Coleoptera) of the Neotropical Region 3213

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Catalogue of the type-species of the genera of the Cerambycidae, Disteniidae, Oxypeltidae and Vesperidae (Coleoptera) of the Neotropical Region 3213

bibRefCitation.author: Buquet
bibRefCitation.refString: Buquet, J. B. L. (1840 c) Notice sur un genre nouveau de longicornes, de la tribu des cerambycins. Revue Zoologique, 1840, 292 - 295.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Coccoderus bisignatus Buquet, 1840
(by subsequent designation Thomson, 1864: 241 ).

bibRefCitation.author: Thomson
bibRefCitation.refString: Thomson, J. (1858 a) Description de dix coleopteres. Archives Entomologiques, 1, 399 - 411.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Diploschema flavipennis Thomson, 1858
(by monotypy). [=
Phaenicocerus rotundicollis
Audinet- Serville, 1834].

bibRefCitation.author: Gounelle
bibRefCitation.refString: Gounelle, E. (1913 a) Chasses de M. E. - R. Wagner, correspondant du Museum, dans les provinces du Nord de la Republique Argentine. Cerambycides nouveaux ou peu connus. Bulletin du Museum National d'Histoire Naturelle, 19, 193 - 231.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Dragomiris quadricornutus Gounelle, 1913
(by monotypy).

Syn.

Type-species:
Monrosia subandina Bosq, 1953
(by original designation).

bibRefCitation.refString: Martins, U. R. & Monne, M. A. (1980) Torneutini (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae): chave para os generos, chave para especies de alguns generos, notas e descricoes de novos taxa. Papeis Avulsos de Zoologia, 33 (24), 335 - 353.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Torneutes obscurus Guérin-Méneville, 1843
(by original designation).

Type-species:

.

bibRefCitation.refString: Seabra, C. A. C. & Tavakilian, G. L. (1986) Un nouveau genre, une nouvelle espece de Torneutini: Gnathopraxithea sarryi, nov. sp. (Coleoptera, Cerambycidae). L'Entomologiste, 42 (4), 227 - 232.

subSubSection.paragraph:

subSubSection.paragraph:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:
Xestia thomsoni Chabrillac, 1857
(by original designation).

bibRefCitation.author: Perty
bibRefCitation.refString: Perty, J. A. M. (1828) Ueber einige Fuhlerformen der Kafer und eine neue Sipp, Psygmatocerus. Isis Oken, 7, 737 - 740.

in Cuvier, 1829: 113

Badariottia gianelli Giglio-Tos, 1893

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type-species:

subSubSection.paragraph:
